caption: Returning to the cockpit, the co-pilot informed him that the electrical system was damaged. The power of the plane was relied on the backup battery. But the battery could only last for ten minutes. In the cabin, everyone was panicked. The police officer was leaving a message to his family on the phone. Suddenly, his phone fell to the ground. He unfastened his seat belt and wanted to get his phone. However, the plane jolted violently, he lost his balance, fell heavily to the ground and dead. Finally, they passed through the storm. But the plane would soon run out of the electricity. At the last moment, they saw a piece of land.
